title: Guide Gear Lace Up Walking Shoes for Men, Comfortable Shoes for Work, Casual Working, White/Navy, 13D (Medium)
features: FLEXIBLE WITH LACE UP: Get the most contoured fit with our men’s casual sneakers. Flexible and lightweight design allows you to glide these sneakers on easily for the best fit. Lace up gets you to the door faster.

PADDED CUSHIONING INSOLE: Relax your feet with these working shoes for men. Keep them cushioned with support and comfort with this pampering insole that serves to keep your feet bolstered and upright.
COOL WICKING LINING: Breathe better and easily with Guide Gear men's lace up shoes. Feel a cooling sensation that tingles your feet with comfort as you go on your daily stroll or walk in the park.
SPEEDFLEX RUBBER OUTSOLE: Our men’s tennis shoes aid the natural walking motion with total traction. Feel an effortless movement with total support throughout.

description: Guide Gear men's walking shoes are your go-to everyday shoes. With flexible leather uppers, these shows provide firm support for long-term use. Cushion and pamper yourself with the necessary comfort while feeling effortless movements with our sneakers. Most walking shoes from other brands tend to be heavy on the feet. Guide Gear's men's casual shoes provide a lightweight feel and flexible design, so you can adjust your feet easily and get a pleasant and breathable fit.

Shock-absorbing midsole provides comfort and the best protection from aches and pains. Keep your feet protected and healthy with our shock absorbent feature. But besides feet protection, experience the blissful cooling effect of these sneakers with our embedded wicking lining for a cooling sensation. Walk miles without sweat or moisture prevent you from reaching your walking performance or number of steps. Additionally, Speedflex rubber outsole promotes a natural walking motion and has the traction you want in athletic shoes.
